asset¶

main¶

Asset controller

class spam.controllers.asset.main.Controller(*args, **kwargs)¶

REST controller for managing assets.

In addition to the standard REST verbs this controller defines the following REST-like methods:

  • checkout (checkout())
  • release (release())
  • publish (get_publish(), post_publish())
  • submit (get_submit(), post_submit())
  • recall (get_recall(), post_recall())
  • sendback (get_sendback(), post_sendback())
  • approve (get_approve(), post_approve())
  • revoke (get_revoke(), post_revoke())
  • download (download())
checkout(proj, asset_id)¶

Checkout an asset.

The asset will be blocked and only the current owner will be able to publish new versions until it is released.

download(proj, assetver_id)¶

Return a version of an asset from the repository as a file attachment in the response body.

get_all(proj, container_type, container_id)¶

Return a tab page with a list of all categories and a button to add new assets.

This page is used as the assets tab in the shot and libgroup view:
  • spam.controllers.shot.main.get_one()
  • spam.controllers.libgroup.main.get_one().
get_approve(proj, asset_id, **kwargs)¶

Display a APPROVE form.

get_delete(proj, asset_id, **kwargs)¶

Display a DELETE confirmation form.

get_one(proj, asset_id)¶

Return a standalone page with the asset history

get_publish(proj, asset_id, **kwargs)¶

Display a PUBLISH form.

get_recall(proj, asset_id, **kwargs)¶

Display a RECALL form.

get_revoke(proj, asset_id, **kwargs)¶

Display a REVOKE form.

get_sendback(proj, asset_id, **kwargs)¶

Display a SENDBACK form.

get_submit(proj, asset_id, **kwargs)¶

Display a SUBMIT form.

new(proj, container_type, container_id, **kwargs)¶

Display a NEW form.

post(proj, container_type, container_id, category_id, name, comment=None)¶

Create a new asset

post_approve(proj, asset_id, comment=None)¶

Approve an asset submitted for approval.

post_delete(proj, asset_id)¶

Delete an asset.

Only delete the asset record from the db, the asset file(s) must be removed manually. (This should help prevent awful accidents) ;)

post_publish(proj, asset_id, uploaded, comment=None, uploader=None)¶

Publish a new version of an asset.

This will commit to the repo the file(s) already uploaded in a temporary storage area, and create a thumbnail and preview if required.

post_recall(proj, asset_id, comment=None)¶

Recall an asset submitted for approval.

post_revoke(proj, asset_id, comment=None)¶

Revoke approval for an asset.

post_sendback(proj, asset_id, comment=None)¶

Send back an asset for revision.

post_submit(proj, asset_id, comment=None)¶

Submit an asset to supervisors for approval.

release(proj, asset_id)¶

Release an asset.

The asset will be unblocked and available for other users to checkout.
